title: Creepy Game Sound Effects
description: Creepy Game is an immersive, out of the ordinary & designed mystery horror game sound effects library bridging the gap between musical elements & game-ready audio assets.
longDescription:
Soundcloud Demo

Youtube Demo

Creepy Game includes a solid total of 425 loops & SFX inspired by the leading horror games currently on the market. This producer-curated collection will save you time and optimize your workflow because the sounds are organized into easy-to-understand, production-friendly categories. Doors, Hit FX, Loops Environment, Loops Music, Musical Alerts, Power-Ups, Transitions, & UI.


Inside you get unchained access to some of the most cutting edge cinematic game sounds like: loop-able ambiences, tension music loops, spine-tingling musical alerts, airy animation logos, unique identity sounds, cinema brass horn notifications, orchestral melodic stingers, movie trailer hits, reveals, risers, whooshes, transitions, motion sounds, negative & positive fx, game win, game over, creepy bells & pianos, inventory items & actions, enter game screen alerts, fail rings, incorrect buttons, mystery solved, task sounds, violin alert cues, specials, power-ups, potions, collects, keys, coins, recharges, items, unlocks, doors, knocks, hits, airy passes, ambience loops, music loops for menu screen & gameplay, horror items, cinematic impacts & movie trailer slams, pulses, mechanisms, & a variety of task sounds.


A beastly sound collection to exaggerate and expand the dimensions of your production with the click of a mouse and for just pennies a click. The library comes in at a nice compact, easy to handle 613.3 MB of memory size .zip file. It’s 57 minutes of sound effects and commercial use ready, royalty-free & includes music tracks and loops. Even more, the music tracks are complete with alternative mixes that you can mix, match and layer them into an awesome-sounding production. All 400+ sounds are pre-mixed and mastered and delivered in 44.1k/16-Bit WAV Format giving you the ability to edit your sounds, pitch shifting, and fx processing.


Simply drag & drop Creepy Game into your favorite animation software, digital audio workstation (DAW), or audio or video editing program and BOOM, you’re on your way to fame! You’ll have no problem creating fear, shock, darkness, evil, & tension audio experiences. Listen to the demo, everything you hear is what you get! All designed to make your audio life easier and faster with market-leading quality and creativity, at an unquestionable value.


Product Details:

425 designed cinematic & game audio assets

Everything you need for UI, game items, alerts & notifications, music, ambiences & cinematic scenes.

Perfect sounds for mystery, crime, investigation, horror & killing games.

613.3 MB of high-quality samples

Over 57 minutes of cinematic game audio

All in 44.1k/16-Bit WAV Audio File Format.

Includes Soundminer metadata for easy search capability.

21 creepy door open, closes, factory sliding door, wooden creaks, drags, pulley open

48 epic hits, impacts, fx for cinematic items, in-game actions, scary moments, & scenes - beefy, dark, punchy, organic

21 horror ambient loops - like dark space, tense atmospheres, eerie soundscapes - all loop-able

22 music loops - hitting on moods like - tension, suspense, investigative, crime, darkness - all loop-able

110 musical alerts, notifications - this section is gold - perfect for awards, UI, game over, game win, negative prompts, tension building & much more.

26 game power-ups - great for items, buffs, boosters, specials, etc.

42 motion & transition SFX like dark, ghastly, atmospheric, pulse, reveal, riser, whoosh

135 UI SFX - perfect for keys, items, inventory, slots, collects, pick-ups, coins, stars, treasure, buttons - will outfit your entire game.

All sound effects are royalty-free & mixed & mastered.

Easy to download - RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)

Works with every DAW & game engine.
